itunes:title: #171 - The Being Boss Book
title: #171 - The Being Boss Book
description:
The Being Boss book is officially out in the world! In today's Being Boss episode, we're in celebration mode and we want to share ALL the behind-the-scenes to what it takes to envision, write, edit, design, record an audiobook, and bring a book into the world.

This episode is sponsored by Freshbooks Cloud Accounting & Twenty20

Get full show notes for this episode here

---

Follow Being Boss on Instagram: @beingbossclub
Follow Being Boss on Twitter: @beingbossclub
Follow Being Boss on Facebook: facebook.com/beingbossclub

—

Listen to more Being Boss shows on our website, on Apple Podcasts, or wherever you listen to podcasts.
